name: Hazel Run
description:
Hi !

Hazel Run is a Third Person Endless Runner, created by French Students, where you play as a Squirrel that was too lazy to collect Nuts for winter and is now in a hurry because it's coming soon ! Watch out for natural obstacles and other squirrels as well ! 

Try and go as far as possible and collect as much nuts as you can before getting too tired to keep running !

The game was realized with 6 people in about 2 months.

The team hope you'll like the game ! And if you have any feedbacks, don't hesitate to comment !
